game.name: Dicey Hacker 1999
game.shortDescription: 「Dicey Hacker 1999」 is a cyberpunk roguelite driven by dice-based strategy. As a hacker in a post-1999 parallel world, gather resources, hack programs, manipulate probabilities via bizarre devices. Each dice rewrites reality's code, every roll destabilizes the digital abyss.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 「Dicey Hacker 1999」 is a cyberpunk roguelite driven by dice-based strategy. As a hacker in a post-1999 parallel world, gather resources, hack programs, manipulate probabilities via bizarre devices. Each dice rewrites reality's code, every roll destabilizes the digital abyss.
